spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout roughly matches (living at left with large balcony, dining center, bedrooms to right, kitchen/utility/servant at bottom-left), but there are major dimensional/proportion mismatches. Master suite zone is significantly distorted: the dress area is massively oversized relative to the 2D plan and the master balcony width appears changed. Bedroom 4 is enlarged and bedroom 3 is reduced. Several internal door swing/orientation and exact placements around the dining/bedroom junctions do not cleanly match the 2D plan. Window placement/counts on external walls are not consistently preserved (notably kitchen/bedroom edges).

structural_fidelity.notes: Primary adjacencies are mostly preserved (living-dining-kitchen relationship and bedroom cluster on right). Wall thickness and door embedding are generally consistent, but the master dress/toilet block configuration is structurally inconsistent with the 2D (scale and partitioning). No major room is entirely absent, though the bathroom layout/partition fidelity is weak and some openings appear relocated or resized.

furniture_mapping.notes: Living room seating concept broadly matches (sofa group + tables) but is not a faithful mapping to the 2D furniture arrangement. Bedrooms include additional seating/side furniture not indicated in the 2D. Some furniture appears oversized/undersized relative to the distorted room sizes (e.g., bedroom 4 and dress area).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, legible isometric presentation with generally good lighting and readable spaces. However, it is not truly orthographic/isometric-accurate in the architectural sense due to proportion inconsistencies and some geometry/label artifacts. Composition is clear but dimensional credibility is compromised.

detected_errors.description: Severe proportion distortion in the master suite: dress room is vastly larger than the 2D plan indicates (appears expanded/merged in footprint), altering the master block proportions.
Room size distortions across bedrooms: Bedroom 4 is enlarged, Bedroom 3 is reduced, and Bedroom 2 dimensions do not match the 2D proportions.
Utility area width is inconsistent with the 2D plan (2D shows ~5'9" wide; 3D labeling/scale suggests a much wider utility).
Master balcony dimension appears altered (2D shows a 5'0" wide balcony for the master; 3D depicts it as 6'0" wide), changing exterior massing.
Multiple door swing/orientation mismatches around the dining-to-bedroom zone and bathroom entries (door arcs/opening directions do not consistently match the 2D plan).
Window placement/count mismatches: external wall openings are simplified/relocated (notably kitchen and right-side bedroom walls), not faithfully matching the 2D window positions.
Hallucinated/added furniture elements (e.g., extra chairs/tables in bedrooms) not shown on the 2D plan.
Minor rendering artifacts/labeling issues (blurred text, slight edge softness) that reduce technical clarity.
